actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill directing the Secretary of Transportation to establish an instrument landing system at Bowling Green-Warren County Airport, Bowling Green, Kentucky.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation, acting through the Federal Aviation Administration, to establish an instrument landing system at Bowling Green-Warren County Airport, Bowling Green, Kentucky. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill directing the Secretary of Transportation to establish an instrument landing system at Bowling Green-Warren County Airport, Bowling Green, Kentucky.
